column1: massive respect to you for staying true to yourself  mel and not being a puppett

I really appreciate those who keep it clean I ll keep praying that God further molds you into a brighter and brighter light for his kingdom. so just keep going and dont stop what youre doing. and for every troll or wokie that gets big mad at you  just remember you ve got plenty of people behind you who appreciate you and what you have to say. me included   stay awesome  melonie
